The new Post newsletter receives compliments: we are flattered and grateful, humming

05 Nov 2019, 15:07

The new Post Le Canzoni newsletter, written every evening by Luca Sofri, the Post's director, has been sent to subscribers for three weeks and has already received many appreciations and kind compliments of which we are very happy: we like the Post to be useful for to understand the world, as we have always said, but also to make it pleasant, when possible, or to share the good where it is found. For gratitude and pride - and for self-promotion, of course - we allow ourselves to take back here some of the messages received in these first days (for those who subscribe: remember to indicate which newsletters you want to receive)
